phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
This here is a secret base for a certain gang of thieves in the west outskirts of Magnolia.
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
Do not go robbin' people when you are such weaklings!
You think you will get away with doing this to us?
Master Devon will not stand for it!
We beat that guy a while ago.
I have finished up over here as well.
Looks like you have not had enough punishment yet...
That took less time than I thought.
I did not get to go nuts enough!
You were plenty nuts back there, buddy.
You cannot just go taking that!
Is not that Loke over there?
You had a job around here?
I wanted to thank you for...
Sorry, I am in the middle of a job!
What did you do to him?
He is so totally avoiding you.
The Star that Cannot Return to the Heavens!
Now then, shall we go back?
Hey, since we actually finished a job early for once, why do not we head to a spa and take it easy?
This is Magnolia's most popular spa town, Hosenka.
Set up by a Duke influenced by the Orient, it is a garish and somewhat iffy tourist spot.
And besides, what is with Loke, anyway?
And a nice bath, as well.
I feel more at ease like this.
But, does not it feel kind of gross?
Coming to a spa such as this really does merit complete relaxation, I agree.
Yet your words are as stiff as ever...
You are even amazing when you are naked, Erza!
Then how about I try going around the guild naked?
Nighttime in hotels means pillow fists!
All the pillows of merit in the room are already under my control!
What am I going to do with you people?
Wow, where did all these pillows come from?
Juvia is so happy being of help to Gray-sama!
Maybe I will mix it up myself...
Well, Happy's a cat, and you are a dog, Plue!
I am an emissary of the Hero with the Sacred Stone-pun!
Stop this foolishness and come out, you.
I thought you would be stupid enough for me to fool you for a week.
That is quite a generous guesstimate there...
So, where are you going, Lucy?
Having a pillow fight with those guys is bad for my health.
That yukata looks great on you.
We came here from Oshibana, man!
Let us have a funky time, man!
Sorry, but I am with someone.
Not even a little while, man?
You are with that cat and...
Well, it is okay to take those funky little fellas with us, man.
Let us have a good time together.
We will have one funky night, man!
Those two have been targeting lone female travelers.
I was in the middle of capturing them.
I have to deliver these guys, so if you will excuse me.
And also for finding my keys.
So, why do not we go out for a bit?
That is not what I meant.
It is one of the top-two most popular spots in the town of Hosenka.
It is said you will become hooked on the various delicacies cooked up by its silent, nodding chef.
You do not have to stay so far away.
I have wanted to ask you this for a while, but what did this Celestial Wizard to do you?
If you do not want to tell, I do not mind...
But I am not that person, you know.
I apologize if I have hurt you.
You should just forget about me.
What is with that cliched breakup line?
That is not what I meant...
I remembered something from long ago.
I just wanted to ask, is all.
I understand a bit why you are so popular.
And for me I thought, we really are friends, after all.
This is a trick to pick up girls!
You make them all sad for you.
I bet you are pretty surprised.
I cannot be swept away by feelings.
They say they got hurt in a pillow fight after their job was over.
How can people get that injured in a pillow fight?
And what were you gettin' so worked up about for a pillow fight?
I am the one who won, right?
There is actually someone other than Erza who can stop those two...
Lucy, you have been in a bad mood.
Are you still angry about me tricking you?
I just have a lot to think about.
You can always talk to me!
That is what I should ask you!
They are women from the town.
It seems they all think they are Loke's girlfriend.
He tried to break up all of a sudden last night!
I hate to say it, but me too!
Why did he say such a thing?
Did he finally find the one?
Is it someone in the guild?
Sure she is a little cute...
And she is got big boobs...
Do not put me in such a sticky situation, Mira!
This is the sole public bath in Magnolia.
It is renowned for regenerating magical power as it relieves fatigue.
Using the public bath once in a while sure is nice!
Nothing beats soaking in a huge bath!
It is perfect after you get out of the bath.
I wanted to drink it together with you.
You know I had it pretty rough this afternoon thanks to you.
I wonder what happens to shooting stars after they fall?
Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the heavens?
That is another line to pick up girls, is not it?
You think you can trick me again?
Everything out of your mouth is to get girls...
I am glad I was able to talk with you casually like this.
Gate of the Southern Cross, I open thee!
So Crux is this old man!
It is kind of sudden, but I have a request.
Can you use your power to look into the Celestial Wizard that Loke was with in the past, Crumudgeon?
Do not worry, he is looking things up.
Crumudgeon is a specialist in Celestial Studies.
He knows everything about the gates that connect the Spirit World with the human one.
He knows all about what Celestial Wizards could call out which spirits in the past.
I cannot be too detailed as personal information is protected even in the spirit world, however,
the Celestial Wizard connected to Loke is Karen Lilica.
She is a super-famous Celestial Wizard.
Extremely beautiful, and she used to do photo shoots for Sorcerer.
But some years ago she died while on a job.
So she was a guild wizard.
What was the relationship between Loke and Karen?
I am sorry, but that is all I can say.
I do not have long to live.
Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the heavens?
Loke's gone and left Fairy Tail!
He is been acting totally weird lately.
Where are you going to look for him?
That is Karen's grave, is not it?
You did well to realize I was actually a spirit.
Well, I am a Celestial Wizard with contracts with many spirits.
I finally figured out the truth behind you.
But I should have noticed it sooner, should not I?
After an incident where the owner dies, their contract with the spirit is nullified.
Then the spirit is forced back to the spirit world until a new owner appears.
Karen died, so the contract should be over, and yet you are here in the human world.
For some reason, you cannot return to the spirit world, can you?
Just as humans cannot live in the spirit world, spirits cannot live forever in the human world.
Your spirit life-energy will be slowly drained from you,
and finally you will meet your end.
I could not fathom even one!
I do not have any strength left at all.
I might be able to save you somehow!
Tell me why you cannot return!
I will open the gate for you!
I do not need to be saved.
At this rate you are really going to die!
The reason I cannot go back is simple.
I broke a fundamental rule between owner and spirit.
And because of it, I have been banished from the spirit world for all eternity.
As a spirit, I am a traitor.
I wonder what the spirit world is like?
Natsu, you went through the spirit world once while grabbing onto Virgo, right?
Did not you see back then?
I was gone before I even realized it.
I might have gotten a glimpse of something, though...
What is that supposed to mean?
You will just have to tune in next time to find out!
Now that is a classic preview line!
